hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# SAUVEGARDE DES TABLES Certipaq chez Infomaniak ssh nv319_aloa@nv319.ftp.infomaniak.com 'mysqldump --single-transaction --host=nv319.myd.infomaniak.com -u nv319_aloa --password=hYL_11oSvA7 nv319_certipaqwp wp2020_quform_entries wp2020_quform_entry_data --no-tablespaces > /tmp/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql' cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Certipaq_SaveDB
# Récupération de la sauvegarde des tables de Certipaq scp -r nv319_aloa@nv319.ftp.infomaniak.com:/tmp/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Certipaq_SaveDB
# Copie de la sauvegarde des tables de Certipaq chez OVH # scp -r /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Certipaq_SaveDB/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql zwgipbh@ftp.cluster020.hosting.ovh.net:Sauvegarde/Certipaq/ scp -r /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Certipaq_SaveDB/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql aloaovhjok@ftp.cluster023.hosting.ovh.net:Sauvegarde/Certipaq/
# IMPORT DE LA BASE DE DONEES Certipaq ssh aloaovhjok@ftp.cluster023.hosting.ovh.net 'mysql --host=rm65978-001.privatesql --port=35252 -u adminCerti -p"Kjn7E4lr3NwkDv2NqOkq" extractCertipaq < Sauvegarde/Certipaq/export_database_$(date +%Y-%m-%d).sql'
# On conserve que les 15 derniers jours cd /var/lib/jenkins/HOME/Certipaq_SaveDB find . -ctime +14 -exec rm {} \;
